short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Sales Assistant for Personalised Outreach

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keats AI is an advanced AI assistant designed for sales executives and teams, streamlining daily tasks such as client data collection, creating hyper-personalized outreach campaigns, and automating routine actions. Our solution empowers sales professionals to close deals faster and consistently hit their revenue goals.

Keats AI adapts and evolves by learning from your unique sales interactions, crafting personalized strategies for each client. It captures how you conduct research, pitch, engage with clients, and handle daily tasks like setting reminders or booking meetings. Using this knowledge, Keats AI creates your "digital twin"—a virtual assistant that seamlessly handles your responsibilities, from identifying ideal clients and conducting research to drafting personalized communication, building sales presentations, and scheduling meetings.

Our first feature enables you to create tailored emails for every client, based on their company’s background, value proposition, and specific pain points. We aggregate data from multiple sources, including websites, LinkedIn profiles, news articles, and blogs, to generate a pitch designed to secure meetings.
